title: About
content:
The Swiss Crypto Day is an informal event to promote research in cryptology
in Switzerland.  It will take place at irregular intervals.

The first edition in 2019 is hosted by the crypto group at
the University of Bern.

Related Events

  Bay Area Crypto Day
  Charles River Crypto Day
  DC Area Crypto Day
  Greater Tel Aviv Area Crypto Seminar
  London Crypto Day
  New York Crypto Day
  Tokyo Crypto Day
  Paris Crypto Day

title: Swiss Crypto Day
content: A full day of cryptography talks in Switzerland

title: Research Groups
content:

  University of Bern

  EPFL - DEDIS

  EPFL - LCA
  EPFL - SPRING

  Università della Svizzera italiana - Cryptography and Quantum Information
  Università della Svizzera italiana - ALaRI

  IBM Research

  DFINITY - Zurich
  ETHZ - Information Security and Cryptography
  ETHZ - Distributed Computing
  ETHZ - Information Security
  ETHZ - Network Security
  ETHZ - System Security
  University of Zurich
